Enums/BMSAnalyticsError.html#/s:FO12BMSA.name: analyticsNotInitialized
Enums/BMSAnalyticsError.html#/s:FO12BMSA.abstract: Analytics must be initialized with Analytics.initialize(appName:apiKey:hasUserContext:deviceEvents:) before calling Analytics.send(completionHandler:) or Logger.send(completionHandler:).

Enums/BMSAnalyticsError.html#/s:FO12BMSA.name: noLogsToSend
Enums/BMSAnalyticsError.html#/s:FO12BMSA.abstract: If there are no logs or analytics data recorded, there is nothing to send to the Mobile Analytics service.

Enums/BMSAnalyticsError.html.name: BMSAnalyticsError
Enums/BMSAnalyticsError.html.abstract: These error codes indicate a failure that occurred within the BMSAnalytics framework.

Enums/DeviceEvent.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyti.name: lifecycle
Enums/DeviceEvent.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyti.abstract: Records the duration of the app’s lifecycle from when it enters the foreground to when it goes to the background.

Enums/DeviceEvent.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyti.name: network
Enums/DeviceEvent.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyti.abstract: Records metadata for network requests sent by the Bluemix Mobile Services SDKs (BMSCore, BMSAnalytics, BMSPush, BMSSecurity, etc.).

Classes/Analytics.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalyt.name: isEnabled
Classes/Analytics.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalyt.abstract: Determines whether analytics data will be recorded.

Classes/Analytics.html#/s:ZFE12BMSAnalyt.name: initialize(appName:apiKey:hasUserContext:collectLocation:deviceEvents:)
Classes/Analytics.html#/s:ZFE12BMSAnalyt.abstract: The required initializer for the Analytics class when communicating with a Mobile Analytics service.

Classes/Analytics.html#/s:ZFE12BMSAnalyt.name: send(completionHandler:)
Classes/Analytics.html#/s:ZFE12BMSAnalyt.abstract: Send the accumulated analytics logs to the Mobile Analytics service.

Classes/Analytics.html.name: Analytics
Classes/Analytics.html.abstract: Records analytics data and sends it to the Mobile Analytics service.

Enums/DeviceEvent.html.name: DeviceEvent
Enums/DeviceEvent.html.abstract: The set of device events that the Analytics class will listen for. Whenever an event of the specified type occurs, analytics data for that event will be recorded.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.name: none
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.abstract: Used to turn off all logging, including analytics data.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.name: analytics
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.abstract: Only logs analytics data. Logger will record nothing.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.name: fatal
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.abstract: Indicates that the application crashed or entered a corrupt state.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.name: warn
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.abstract: A warning that may or may not be an actual issue.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.name: info
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:FO15BMSAnalyticsA.abstract: Any useful information that is not considered problematic.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:vO15BMSAnalyticsA.name: asString
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:vO15BMSAnalyticsA.abstract: The string representation of the log level.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.name: logLevelFilter
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.abstract: Logs below this severity level will be ignored, so they will not be recorded or printed to the console.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.name: isInternalDebugLoggingEnabled
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.abstract: If set to true, debug logs from Bluemix Mobile Services frameworks will be displayed on the console.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.name: isLogStorageEnabled
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.abstract: Determines whether logs get stored locally on the device.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.name: maxLogStoreSize
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.abstract: The maximum file size (in bytes) for log storage.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.name: isUncaughtExceptionDetected
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZvC15BMSAnalytics.abstract: True if the app crashed recently due to an uncaught exception.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZFC15BMSAnalytics.name: logger(name:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZFC15BMSAnalytics.abstract: Creates a Logger instance that will be identified by the supplied name.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZFE12BMSAnalytics.name: send(completionHandler:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:ZFE12BMSAnalytics.abstract: Send the accumulated logs to the Mobile Analytics service.

Classes/Logger.html.name: Logger
Classes/Logger.html.abstract: A logging framework that can print messages to the console, store them locally on the device, and send them to the Mobile Analytics service. With each log message, additional information is gathered such as the file, function, and line where the log was created, as well as the severity of the message.
